animeDescription: Aqualoid was a prosperous planet, but an attack from a mysterious life force, the Inorganics, transforms it into a post-apocalyptic shell of its former self. When Nam finds a mysterious sword, he is suddenly the object of a planet-wide chase. With the Inorganics closing in, will Nam and his friends discover the secret of the sword and save their world? Or will they destroy Aqualoid in favor of a new Birth?  (Source: AniDB)
animeVoices: ['Tominaga, Miina', 'Shiraishi, Fuyumi', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Toda, Keiko']
animeStaff: [['Sadamitsu Shinya', ['Director']], ['Matsuura Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Takegami Junki', ['Script']], ['Anno Hideaki', ['Key Animation']]]
